title: Web Developer
description: We are seeking a talented Web Developer to join our Research and Development team at Healthcare Solutions Corp. The ideal candidate will have strong experience with Microservices, AWS, Windows and a passion for building innovative solutions. You will work on cutting-edge projects that impact customer satisfaction.
responsibilities: Collaborate with stakeholders to deliver features
Mentor team members and share knowledge

benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
